Get a example of MERRA2 data for a particular month(s)

Source: R/merra_subset.R
merra2_sample.Rd

Get a example of MERRA2 data for a particular month(s)

merra2_sample(month = 1:12, add.coord = FALSE)

Arguments

month

integer vector with month numbers (1 to 12)

Value

An example of MERRA-2 data set for a requested month, 21st day, 2010. The returned data.table has the same format as returned by get_merra2_subset().

Examples

 merra2_sample()

#>                           UTC  locid T10M W10M W50M PS_hPa SWGDN ALBEDO
#>        1: 2010-01-21 00:30:00      1  247  2.4  3.1    695   339    0.8
#>        2: 2010-01-21 00:30:00      2  247  2.4  3.1    695   339    0.8
#>        3: 2010-01-21 00:30:00      3  247  2.4  3.1    695   339    0.8
#>        4: 2010-01-21 00:30:00      4  247  2.4  3.1    695   339    0.8
#>        5: 2010-01-21 00:30:00      5  247  2.4  3.1    695   339    0.8
#>       ---                                                              
#> 59885564: 2010-12-21 23:30:00 207932  263  6.2  7.8   1017     0    0.0
#> 59885565: 2010-12-21 23:30:00 207933  263  6.2  7.8   1017     0    0.0
#> 59885566: 2010-12-21 23:30:00 207934  263  6.3  7.8   1017     0    0.0
#> 59885567: 2010-12-21 23:30:00 207935  263  6.3  7.8   1017     0    0.0
#> 59885568: 2010-12-21 23:30:00 207936  263  6.3  7.8   1017     0    0.0
 merra2_sample(2:3)

#>                          UTC  locid T10M W10M W50M PS_hPa SWGDN ALBEDO
#>       1: 2010-02-21 00:30:00      1  232  4.7  6.2    690   135   0.80
#>       2: 2010-02-21 00:30:00      2  232  4.7  6.2    690   135   0.80
#>       3: 2010-02-21 00:30:00      3  232  4.7  6.2    690   135   0.80
#>       4: 2010-02-21 00:30:00      4  232  4.7  6.2    690   135   0.80
#>       5: 2010-02-21 00:30:00      5  232  4.7  6.3    690   135   0.80
#>      ---                                                              
#> 9980924: 2010-03-21 23:30:00 207932  253  5.5  6.3   1032     0   0.82
#> 9980925: 2010-03-21 23:30:00 207933  253  5.5  6.4   1032     0   0.82
#> 9980926: 2010-03-21 23:30:00 207934  253  5.5  6.4   1032     0   0.82
#> 9980927: 2010-03-21 23:30:00 207935  253  5.5  6.4   1032     0   0.82
#> 9980928: 2010-03-21 23:30:00 207936  253  5.6  6.4   1032     0   0.82
